entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snowshower, -8.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sault Ste. Marie Airport 9:00 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
Condition: Light Snowshower
Temperature: -8.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.5 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 65 %
Wind Chill: -16
Dewpoint: -14.2°C
Wind: WSW 18 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming west 20 km/h early this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Flurries beginning late in the afternoon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. Wind becoming west 30 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 12. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Local amount 5 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 22 in the evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
